title: HR Analytics Using Power BI
alt: HR Analytics Dashboard showing employee attrition metrics
description: Created a comprehensive Power BI dashboard analyzing employee attrition and workforce trends. Delivered actionable insights that helped HR teams improve retention strategies and optimize compensation structures.

title: Amazon Sales Analytics Using Power BI
alt: Amazon Sales Dashboard showing regional sales performance
description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard analyzing Amazon sales trends, product performance, and state-wise profits. Enabled data-driven decision making through comprehensive sales analytics and regional performance insights.

title: Heart Disease Prediction Using Machine Learning
alt: Heart disease prediction model results visualization
description: Compared multiple machine learning, deep learning, and ensemble models for heart disease prediction. Achieved 93% ROC-AUC with a stacked ensemble model, demonstrating strong evaluation and model optimization skills.

title: Analysis of Suicide Trends in India
alt: Suicide trends visualization across Indian states
description: Analyzed suicide trends across Indian states using NCRB 2021 data. Created comprehensive visualizations to understand patterns and contributing factors, providing insights for public health policy decisions.

title: Netflix Movie Analysis
description: Analyzed Netflix movie dataset to explore trends in popularity, genres, ratings, and release years. Performed data cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis to uncover key insights about factors influencing movie success on the platform.

title: Automated Multi-City Weather Dashboard
alt: Power BI weather dashboard showing real-time weather and air quality for multiple Indian cities
description: A fully automated, enterprise-grade weather monitoring dashboard built with Power BI and GitHub Actions. Provides real-time weather and air quality data for 9 Indian cities, with automated data refresh every 3 hours, interactive visualizations, and advanced automation features.
